title: FIX CHAMPION MASTERY
body: Its been nearly a week since one of my friends got 2 champs to lv 5, yet they still don't have their banner or custom CTRL + 6 emotes, which you are supposed to get at lv 4. I also reached lv 5 and still nothing after ages. Can you guys plz fix this, I spent time leveling up my champ to be able to emote CTRL + 6 but cant. Plz give it to us riot

replies.body:
I've had my banner and emote on Taric for several days now :/ Haven't played the last 3 days, but i'll take a look to see if it's still there.
Does this happen with any champs, just a few of those, or do they vanish after hitting lv5?
it seems to work on a select few champs, fizz and taric the only champs I met that actually got it from being l 4-5 every other 1 doesn't work
Wow. Lucky me, i'm a Taric main. That's why i didn't notice.
I agree, champion mastery is meaningless

Yeah, Ive sent them an email along with a few other summoner.
This should be resolved soon.
